product_name: Columbia Insect Blocker Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: The Columbia Insect Blocker(TM) pants keep pesky mosquitoes away so you can enjoy your journey into the great outdoors. Insect Blocker repellent technology helps keep biting and potentially disease-carrying insects at bay; Insect Blocker repellent lasts through 70 washings. Nylon fabric with Omni-Wick(TM) technology pulls moisture off your skin for quick evaporation so you stay cool and comfortable on hot days. Mini ripstop fabric stands up to abrasion on the trail. With a UPF 30 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Hand pockets, rip-and-stick rear pockets and a zippered thigh pocket offer plenty of space for trail essentials; mesh pocket bags allow airflow. Inseam gusset allows unrestricted range of motion. Partial elastic waistband allows a comfortable fit; belts loops let you secure the fit with a belt (sold separately). Cinch the leg openings around your boots to keep trail debris from getting in. The Columbia Insect Blocker pants have a classic fit with straight legs.
short_description: The Columbia Insect Blocker(TM) pants keep pesky mosquitoes away so you can enjoy your journey into the great outdoors.
